data.title: University of Mississippi
data.meta_description: Jackson Ross (20) IF/OF - CAREER HIGHLIGHTS • 2024 CSC Academic All-District 2024 (Senior): Was the only player to start all 56 games for the Rebels, startin...
data.text:
CAREER HIGHLIGHTS • 2024 CSC Academic All-District

2024 (Senior): Was the only player to start all 56 games for the Rebels, starting 35 games at first base, 12 in left field, five in right field, and four as DH ... Led the team in runs scored (52), walks (55), and sacrifice flies (5) ... Finished second on the team in on base percentage (.438) and RBI (49) ... Finished third on the team in slugging percentage (.492), home runs (10), and total bases (95) ... Posted the fourth-most walks by a Rebel in a single season with 55 free passes ... Went 2-for-5 with two walks and two runs scored at Hawaii (2/16) ... Went 7-for-9 with four home runs, 10 RBI, eight runs scored, and four walks in three-game series against High Point (2/23-25) ... Went 3-for-4 with a home run, a double, a walk, three RBI, and three runs scored against Little Rock (2/27) ... Drew seven walks over three games against Iowa and Memphis (3/2-6) ... Went 2-for-3 with a double, two walks, an RBI, and a run scored against Memphis (3/6) ... Went 1-for-4 with a home run and two RBI at Tennessee (3/24) ... Went 2-for-4 with a home run and two RBI against Kentucky (3/30) ... Went 3-for-5 with two doubles, two walks, two RBI, and two runs scored against Mississippi State (4/13) ... Went 3-for-5 with a home run, a double, two RBI, and three runs scored at Auburn (5/3) ... Went 1-for-4 with three walks and two runs scored against Murray State (5/8).

FLORIDA ATLANTIC: Two-year letterwinner for the Owls … Started in 115 games in 116 appearances … Earned 144 hits and 91 runs during his time at FAU … Brought in 90 RBI overall … Posted 21 home runs with a career slugging average of .540 … Named to the C-USA First Team All-Conference for his senior year performance … Only player to start all 59 games at the same position … Finished second on the team with 14 home runs and third on the team with 58 RBI … Led the team with 26 multi-hit games … Homered in six of the final eight games of the season, including twice in the C-USA Tournament … Started 56 games at third base in his first season as an Owl … Finished his junior season with a flurry, recording 11 hits in the last nine games … Finished third on the team with 16 doubles … Coached by John McCormack.

PASCO-HERNANDO: Two-year letterwinner for Pasco-Hernando State College … Competed in 84 career games … Hit .346 average, the fifth highest in program history … Posted 12 home runs, 90 RBI and 88 runs scored … Led the NJCAA with 135 plate appearances, 13 doubles and 31 RBI in his second season with PHSC … Coached by Lyndon Coleman.

HIGH SCHOOL: Four-year letterwinner at George Jenkins High School … Earned a .456 OBP, 0.48 ERA in 29.1 innings pitched his senior season … Held a 4.0 throughout high school, finishing third in his class … Also played on his high school’s golf team … Coached by Chad Crosby.

PERSONAL: Full name is Haskell Jackson Ross … Son of Kim and Buddy Ross … Born on April 5, 2000 … Majoring in health science … Father attended Ole Miss.
